ItemDesc: Upon use, ATK of all allies increases by <unbreak>14%</unbreak> plus an additional <unbreak>230</unbreak> ATK increase for the next battle.
ItemBGDesc: An extremely unhealthy drink, but when you drink it, you will have a mysterious smile on your face. "Don't drink too much of it. This stuff has a lot of calories." "Don't worry. It's frozen, and the ingredient list says that there is L-carnitine in it."
